Authorization.name: Authorization
Authorization.description: Please enter the Bearer token here

parameters.name: login
parameters.description: API to authenticate users for the admin panel using login credentials (email and password).

token.description: JWT token to authenticate further API requests.

parameters.name: Forgot Password
parameters.description: Sends a password reset link to the admin's registered email address for resetting the password.

400.description: Invalid email address format or email not found.

parameters.name: verify-otp
parameters.description: API to verify the OTP (One Time Password) sent to the admin's email or phone number during the password reset process.

200.description: OTP verification successful. The password reset process is now complete.

400.description: Invalid OTP format or OTP expired.

parameters.name: reset-password
parameters.description: The admin's registered password and token associated with the account.

200.description: A success message confirming that the password has been reset.

400.description: Invalid password format or missing fields.

parameters.name: users-list
parameters.description: API to retrieve a list of all users in the system for admin panel access.

200.description: A list of users in the system.

parameters.name: users-list
parameters.description: Fetches the wallet information of a specific user by their user ID.

200.description: Successfully retrieved wallet details for the user.

400.description: Invalid user ID provided. or User not found.

parameters.name: transactions-list
parameters.description: Fetches a list of transactions for a user or account.

parameters.name: transactions-list
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to fetch data for (optional).

parameters.name: transactions-list
parameters.description: API to manage and retrieve settings for users and the system.

parameters.name: transactions-list
parameters.description: API to manage and retrieve settings for users and the system.
